The Butterfly Curve

By Daniel Marcelino October 07, 2015 Comment Tweet Like +1

Have you ever thought drawing your own butterfly? I came across the butterfly curve, which was discovered by Temple Fay. The butterfly curve is produced by a parametric equation where: x = sin(t) * (e^cos(t)-2cos(λt)-sin(t/12)^5) and y = cos(t) * (e^cos(t)-2cos(λt)-sin(t/12)^5). Where t stands for time and λ for a user input variable.
